traits.Amphibious: The royal can breathe air and water.
traits.Brute: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the royal hits with it (included in the attack).
traits.Frog Rider: The royal has advantage on melee attacks made while riding a frog mount.
traits.Speak with Frogs and Toads: The royal can communicate simple concepts to frogs and toads when it speaks in Bullywug.
traits.Standing Leap: The royal's long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.
traits.Swamp Camouflage: The royal has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in swampy terrain.
